title: The Tanganyika Republic Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-tanganyika-republic-act | Legal areas: Citizenship and Nationality

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In this Act-                                           lntnpret.-
                                                            tim.
     “commencement of this Act” means 9th December,
          1962
     “Minister” means the Minister responsible for external
         affairs;
     “Parliament” means the Parliament of Jamaica.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3.-(1) On and after the commencement of this Act, all Op,tionot
existing law, that is to say all law which, whether being a exirtinshw.
rule of law or a provision of an Act of Parliament or of any
other enactment or instrument whatsoever, is in force on that
day or has been passed or made before that day and comes
into force thereafter, shall, unless and until provision to the
contrary is made by Parliament or some other authority hav-
ing power in that behalf, and subject to the following provi-
sions of this section, have the same operation in relation to
Tanganyika, and persom and things belonging to or
connected with Tanganyika, as it would have apart from
this subsection if Tanganyika had not become a Republic.
      (2) The Minister may, by order, make such adapta-
tions in any enactment passed before or after the com-
mencement of this Act, or in any instrument having effect
under any such enactment, as appear to him necessary or
expedient in consequence of Tanganyika having become a
Republiq and any such order may, though made after the
       l l l I e ioclusioa of (his pplt t ~utboriEedby L.N. 480/19731

!
    2                          TANGANYIKA REPUBLIC
             commencement of this Act, be made so as to have effect
             from that day.
                   (3) Every order made under subsection (2) shall be
             subject to negative resolution.
